page.title: 17FAVOURITE FILMS & VIDEOS
page.content: Q.What are your favourite 3{films}? {BOYS % 1.Ghostbusters (spoof/horror).......27 2.Gremlins (comedy/horror)..........10 3.Indiana Jones & the Temple of Doom (Spielberg directed adventure).... 9 4.Raiders of the Lost Ark (Spielberg directed adventure).... 8 {GIRLS % 1.Ghostbusters (spoof/horror).......25 2.ET (Spielberg directed SF)........13 3.Gremlins (comdey/horror)..........11 4.Indiana Jones & the Temple of Doom (Spielberg directed adventure).... 7 -------------------------------------- Q.What are your favourite 3{videos}? {BOYS % 1.Police Academy (comedy)...........12 {GIRLS % 1.Police Academy (comedy)........... 9 --------------------------------------
